Package arb.functions.complex

Class WickRotation

java.lang.Object
arb.functions.complex.WickRotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComplexFunction, Function<Complex,Complex>
public class WickRotation extends Object implements ComplexFunction
Multiplication by the imaginary unit with optional negation. Wick rotation is called a rotation because when we represent complex numbers as a plane, the multiplication of a complex number by i is equivalent to rotating the vector representing that number by an angle of Ï€/2 about the origin.
Author:
crow
